text.section:
In each county in the first seven judicial circuits there shall be the number of resident judges of the circuit court set forth below, including the judge or judges provided for by the Constitution:
Allegany2
Anne Arundel12
Baltimore County18
Calvert2
Caroline1
Carroll3
Charles4
Cecil3
Dorchester1
Frederick4
Garrett1
Harford5
Howard5
Kent1
Montgomery22
Prince George's23
Queen Anne's1
St. Mary's3
Somerset1
Talbot1
Washington5
Wicomico3
Worcester3
In Baltimore City there shall be 33 resident judges of the Circuit Court for Baltimore City.
